attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCFhdE2tAkFsXJkySX7_description
attribs.current: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCFhdE9LZaDCzPIwSPL_description
attribs.current:
You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to [[1d10 + @{level}]]

Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCFhdEKsy1Iz5-Bz-gK_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 2nd level, you can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible bonus action.

Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again. Starting at 17th level, you can use it twice before a rest, but only once on the same turn.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCFhdEP3BGq-E33tA1a_description
attribs.current:
Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

The number of attacks increases to three when you reach 11th level in this class and to four when you reach 20th level in this class.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCFheFmFGPqmvJxWJA2_description
attribs.current:
At 3rd level, you learn a ritual that creates a magical bond between yourself and one weapon. You perform the ritual over the course of 1 hour, which can be done during a short rest. The weapon must be within your reach throughout the ritual, at the conclusion of which you touch the weapon and forge the bond.

Once you have bonded a weapon to yourself, you can't be disarmed of that weapon unless you are incapacitated. If it is on the same plane of existence, you can summon that weapon as a bonus action on your turn, causing it to teleport instantly to your hand.

You can have up to two bonded weapons, but can summon only one at a time with your bonus action. If you attempt to bond with a third weapon, you must break the bond with one of the other two.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCFiZqQ6BmTUeTcZl47_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Slashing, Range: 20/60,Weapon Attacks: 2,Weapon Attacks: 2,Weapon Attacks: 2

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCFjAvEjpU2Mt2mVGvR_description
attribs.current:
You have practiced casting spells in the midst of combat, learning techniques that grant you the following benefits:

You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell when you take damage.

You can perform the somatic components of spells even when you have weapons or a shield in one or both hands.

When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use your reaction to cast a spell at the creature, rather than making an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCFloM85nq1V9Q2lUD4_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 20/60, Melee  2, Melee Damage +2,Weapon Attacks: 2,Weapon Attacks: 2,Weapon Attacks: 2

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCFmZVVMS2hhjPayWrp_description
attribs.current: You have a military rank from your career as a soldier. Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority and influence, and they defer to you if they are of a lower rank. You can invoke your rank to exert influence over other soldiers and requisition simple equipment or horses for temporary use. You can also usually gain access to friendly military encampments and fortresses where your rank is recognized.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCFohCckiO8G4cwtnjS_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried. 

 This spell's damage increases by 1d10 when you reach 5th level ( 2d10 ), 11th level ( 3d10 ), and 17th level ( 4d10 ).

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Those who fight beside me are those worth dying for.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I obey the law, even if the law causes misery.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
I'm always polite and respectful.

I face problems head-on. A simple, direct solution is the best path to success.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCFqXdvaDZnLaX8VU6p_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCFqf-jxLqBhVRq1NuJ_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCFqf-jxLqBhVRq1NuJ_spelldescription
attribs.current: The spell captures some of the incoming energy, lessening its effect on you and storing it for your next melee attack. You have resistance to the triggering damage type until the start of your next turn. Also, the first time you hit with a melee attack on your next turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 damage of the triggering type, and the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCFqf-jxLqBhVRq1NuJ_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: allies_and_organizations
attribs.current:
Hawk familiar named Barnaby

Job by town in northwest, Scant in the Catnip Bayou. Only half completed, Dirge Stones found in the dungeon repair stone altars by a magic circle, which the cat is thought to have passed through.

Job in Twill, trouble with kobolds

Job in Parvam: wiped out a group of cultists trying to summon Asmodeous, there is a hole underneath it with something that makes huge roars in it.

Had a threesome with two very beautiful half-elves, one blond and one brunette

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCFt9ZNnfD1VZYIU9Eb_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Holy water or powdered silver and iron, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCFt9ZNnfD1VZYIU9Eb_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures - aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.

The protection grants several benefits. Creatures of those types have disadvantage on attack rolls against the target. The target also can't be charmed, frightened, or possessed by them. If the target is already charmed, frightened, or possessed by such a creature, the target has advantage on any new saving throw against the relevant effect.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCG0yhdMuXQ70H6IgUj_spelldescription
attribs.current:
As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and it becomes sheathed in booming energy until the start of your next turn. If the target willingly moves before then, it immediately takes 1d8 thunder damage, and the spell ends. 

 This spell's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 thunder damage to the target, and the damage the target takes for moving increases to 2d8 . Both damage rolls increase by 1d8 at 11th level and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LCG0yjAShZJyXYzh6IH_rollbase_dmg
attribs.current: @{wtype}&{template:dmg} {{rname=@{atkname}}} @{atkflag} {{range=@{atkrange}}} @{dmgflag} {{dmg1=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8]]}} {{dmg1type=Extra Thunder on a hit }} @{dmg2flag} {{dmg2=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8]]}} {{dmg2type=Thunder if they move }} @{saveflag} {{desc=@{atk_desc}}} @{hldmg} {{spelllevel=@{spelllevel}}} {{innate=@{spell_innate}}} {{globaldamage=[[0]]}} {{globaldamagetype=@{global_damage_mod_type}}} @{charname_output}

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LCG0yjAShZJyXYzh6IH_rollbase_crit
attribs.current: @{wtype}&{template:dmg} {{crit=1}} {{rname=@{atkname}}} @{atkflag} {{range=@{atkrange}}} @{dmgflag} {{dmg1=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8]]}} {{dmg1type=Extra Thunder on a hit }} @{dmg2flag} {{dmg2=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8]]}} {{dmg2type=Thunder if they move }} {{crit1=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8]]}} {{crit2=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8]]}} @{saveflag} {{desc=@{atk_desc}}} @{hldmg}  {{spelllevel=@{spelllevel}}} {{innate=@{spell_innate}}} {{globaldamage=[[0]]}} {{globaldamagecrit=[[0]]}} {{globaldamagetype=@{global_damage_mod_type}}} @{charname_output}

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LCG0yjAShZJyXYzh6IH_atkdmgtype
attribs.current: 4d8 Extra Thunder on a hit + [[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8 Thunder if they move

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LCG0yjAShZJyXYzh6IH_rollbase
attribs.current: @{wtype}&{template:dmg} {{rname=@{atkname}}} @{atkflag} {{range=@{atkrange}}} @{dmgflag} {{dmg1=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8]]}} {{dmg1type=Extra Thunder on a hit }} @{dmg2flag} {{dmg2=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8]]}} {{dmg2type=Thunder if they move }} @{saveflag} {{desc=@{atk_desc}}} @{hldmg} {{spelllevel=@{spelllevel}}} {{innate=@{spell_innate}}} {{globaldamage=[[0]]}} {{globaldamagetype=@{global_damage_mod_type}}} ammo=@{ammo} @{charname_output}

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCKcKkXDsmkEDVZmzLA_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCKcQsS8qadhDAYzCyE_itemcontent
attribs.current: Using a crowbar grants advantage to Strength checks where the crowbar's leverage can be applied.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCKcUJ8JIdj1ZEa-Q07_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCPIAUS83SV8RvGmNcP_itemcontent
attribs.current: A hooded lantern casts bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil. As an action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCPIIjBUdA5OzFiVMXf_itemcontent
attribs.current: Oil usually comes in a clay flask that holds 1 pint. As an action, you can splash the oil in this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a target creature or object, treating the oil as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target is covered in oil. If the target takes any fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an additional 5 fire damage from the burning oil. You can also pour a flask of oil on the ground to cover a 5-foot-square area, provided that the surface is level. If lit, the oil burns for 2 rounds and deals 5 fire damage to any creature that enters the area or ends its turn in the area. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCPIIjBUdA5OzFiVMXf_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 5, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCPM2UZx1qiLQJkYUss_itemcontent
attribs.current: You regain 2d4 + 2 hit points when you drink this potion.  The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDOvqAPro74gtZVi4GW_description
attribs.current: Beginning at 7th level, when you use your action to cast a cantrip, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDZs8S140Z9QlaeBIxV_description
attribs.current: When initiative is rolled you can move up to your speed straight towards an enemy as a free action. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your STR mod (min. 1), your uses refresh on a long rest. This movement does provoke attacks of opportunity if you move out of an enemy's threatened range.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEcKXYXNed0FAsFKIqw_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 30/120,Weapon Attacks: 2,Weapon Attacks: 2,Weapon Attacks: 2

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEhoxxH9AM8-O8OyYcV_description
attribs.current:
Beginning at 9th level, you can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll, and you can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

You can use this feature twice between long rests starting at 13th level and three times between long rests starting at 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFZfKREm5FW6sBU8W53_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature to assail it with the chill of the grave. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn. Until then, the hand clings to the target. 

 If you hit an undead target, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn. 

 This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level ( 2d8 ), 11th level ( 3d8 ), and 17th level ( 4d8 ).

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LFZWwJm8zgL1fxK3sUF_itemcontent
attribs.current: While wearing this helm, you can use an action to cast the comprehend languages spell from it at will.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFZc7ZQO-qB6Awde2cI_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFZc7ZQO-qB6Awde2cI_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create a lash of lightning energy that strikes at one creature of your choice that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line toward you and then take 1d8 lightning damage if it is within 5 feet of you. 

 The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level ( 2d8 ), 11th level ( 3d8 ), and 17th level ( 4d8 ).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFZc85bt-52t50wAZFw_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature within range other than you

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFZc85bt-52t50wAZFw_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create a momentary circle of spectral blades that sweep around you. Each creature within range, other than you, must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 force damage. 

 The spell's damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level ( 2d6 ), 11th level ( 3d6 ), and 17th level ( 4d6 ).

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LFhlxodx78HRoZC5Bi4_itemcontent
attribs.current:
An Ioun stone is named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of Ioun stone exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.

When you use an action to toss one of these stones into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of 1d3 feet and confers a benefit to you. Thereafter, another creature must use an action to grasp or net the stone to separate it from you, either by making a successful attack roll against AC 24 or a successful DC 24 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check. You can use an action to seize and stow the stone, ending its effect.

A stone has AC 24, 10 hit points, and resistance to all damage. It is considered to be an object that is being worn while it orbits your head.

You gain a +1 bonus to AC while this dusty rose prism orbits your head.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFhmYw9Ql8lxRDXLeyn_spelldescription
attribs.current:
As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and green fire leaps from the target to a different creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of it. The second creature takes fire damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier. 

 This spell's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 fire damage to the target, and the fire damage to the second creature increases to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. Both damage rolls increase by 1d8 at 11th level and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LFhmqHKORMirhzCeENy_description
attribs.current: At 10th level, you learn how to make your weapon strikes undercut a creature's resistance to your spells. When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, that creature has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes against a spell you cast before the end of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LFhwnRuqEzkb8VB2ywj_rollbase_dmg
attribs.current: @{wtype}&{template:dmg} {{rname=@{atkname}}} @{atkflag} {{range=@{atkrange}}} @{dmgflag} {{dmg1=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8 + 5[INT]]]}} {{dmg1type=Extra Fire on a hit }} @{dmg2flag} {{dmg2=[[2d8]]}} {{dmg2type=Fire on a second target }} @{saveflag} {{desc=@{atk_desc}}} @{hldmg} {{spelllevel=@{spelllevel}}} {{innate=@{spell_innate}}} {{globaldamage=[[0]]}} {{globaldamagetype=@{global_damage_mod_type}}} @{charname_output}

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LFhwnRuqEzkb8VB2ywj_rollbase_crit
attribs.current: @{wtype}&{template:dmg} {{crit=1}} {{rname=@{atkname}}} @{atkflag} {{range=@{atkrange}}} @{dmgflag} {{dmg1=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8 + 5[INT]]]}} {{dmg1type=Extra Fire on a hit }} @{dmg2flag} {{dmg2=[[2d8]]}} {{dmg2type=Fire on a second target }} {{crit1=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8]]}} {{crit2=[[2d8]]}} @{saveflag} {{desc=@{atk_desc}}} @{hldmg}  {{spelllevel=@{spelllevel}}} {{innate=@{spell_innate}}} {{globaldamage=[[0]]}} {{globaldamagecrit=[[0]]}} {{globaldamagetype=@{global_damage_mod_type}}} @{charname_output}

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LFhwnRuqEzkb8VB2ywj_atkdmgtype
attribs.current: 4d8+5 Extra Fire on a hit + 2d8 Fire on a second target

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LFhwnRuqEzkb8VB2ywj_rollbase
attribs.current: @{wtype}&{template:dmg} {{rname=@{atkname}}} @{atkflag} {{range=@{atkrange}}} @{dmgflag} {{dmg1=[[[[round((@{level} + 1) / 6 + 0.5)]]d8 + 5[INT]]]}} {{dmg1type=Extra Fire on a hit }} @{dmg2flag} {{dmg2=[[2d8]]}} {{dmg2type=Fire on a second target }} @{saveflag} {{desc=@{atk_desc}}} @{hldmg} {{spelllevel=@{spelllevel}}} {{innate=@{spell_innate}}} {{globaldamage=[[0]]}} {{globaldamagetype=@{global_damage_mod_type}}} ammo=@{ammo} @{charname_output}

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFiFIJ6yYjLsz2gKci2_spelldescription
attribs.current: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air. Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFiFNR5EAZ45mtnthkE_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFiFZY9KjyGhntn8j5z_spelldescription
attribs.current:
This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn clack, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no larger than 1 foot in any dimension, you mend it, leaving no trace of the former damage.

This spell can physically repair a magic item or construct, but the spell can't restore magic to such an object.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFiFhhkaq8PBk9DDKzS_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You choose nonmagical flame that you can see within range and that fits within a 5-foot cube. You affect it in one of the following ways: 

 You instantaneously expand the flame 5 feet in one direction, provided that wood or other fuel is present in the new location. 

 You instantaneously extinguish the flames within the cube. 

 You double or halve the area of bright light and dim light cast by the flame, change its color, or both. The change lasts for 1 hour. 

 You cause simple shapessuch as the vague form of a creature, an inanimate object, or a locationto appear within the flames and animate as you like. The shapes last for 1 hour. 

 If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LFjib7nBiddeYZDFGHC_itemcontent
attribs.current: While wearing these dark lenses, you have darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision. wearing the goggles increases its range by 60 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LGC3IPAPCDvLXI84KZR_description
attribs.current: At 11th level, you can attack three times whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LHMkbjsUBLvOnt77xlS_description
attribs.current: Once a spell caster hits level 8 they receive this feat automatically. This feat allows for two spells to be cast per turn(one for an action, one for a bonus action) as long as one is 2nd level or lower. This does not change the Casting Time of spells in anyway, it allows for another spell of 2nd level or lower to be cast.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LHMnsXxi0eNw3N7vYSr_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace. When you cast this spell, and then as a bonus action on each of your turns until the spell ends, you can take the Dash action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LHMpjseMNib6pvEVX34_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature that starts its turn in the line

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LHMpjseMNib6pvEVX34_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose for the spell's duration. Each creature that starts its turn in the line must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from you in a direction following the line. 

 Any creature in the line must spend 2 feet of movement for every 1 foot it moves when moving closer to you. 

 The gust disperses gas or vapor, and it extinguishes candles, torches, and similar unprotected flames in the area. It causes protected flames, such as those of lanterns, to dance wildly and has a 50 percent chance to extinguish them. 

 As a bonus action on each of your turns before the spell ends, you can change the direction in which the line blasts from you.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LHOFH8d594ZnYiNjVm0_itemcontent
attribs.current: While holding this shield, you have a +2 bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LIYrDZ2ZXwZe3TNLR6q_itemcontent
attribs.current: You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LIYrDZ2ZXwZe3TNLR6q_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Slashing, Secondary Damage: 1d10, Melee Attacks +2, Melee Damage +2,Secondary Damage Type: Slashing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LInfYuAiQ32Tb5KEQPK_itemcontent
attribs.current:
This javelin is a magic weapon. When you hurl it and speak its command word, it transforms into a bolt of lightning, forming a line 5 feet wide that extends out from you to a target within 120 feet. Each creature in the line excluding you and the target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d6 lightning damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The lightning bolt turns back into a javelin when it reaches the target. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes damage from the javelin plus 4d6 lightning damage.

The javelin's property can't be used again until the next dawn. In the meantime, the javelin can still be used as a magic weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LInfYuAiQ32Tb5KEQPK_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 30/120,Secondary Damage: 4d6,Secondary Damage Type: Lightning,Weapon Attacks: 2,Weapon Attacks: 2,Weapon Attacks: 2

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LKoHNgRCi9zuvWyNcOA_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LKoHNgRCi9zuvWyNcOA_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LKoHNgRCi9zuvWyNcOA_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LKoHO2xKGOxsX8CFtmd_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature within 5 feet of a point or points you choose within 120 feet of you

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LKoHO2xKGOxsX8CFtmd_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: niter, sulfur, and pine tar formed into a bead

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LKoHO2xKGOxsX8CFtmd_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create six tiny meteors in your space. They float in the air and orbit you for the spell's duration. When you cast the spelland as a bonus action on each of your turns thereafteryou can expend one or two of the meteors, sending them streaking toward a point or points you choose within 120 feet of you. Once a meteor reaches its destination or impacts against a solid surface, the meteor explodes. Each creature within 5 feet of the point where the meteor explodes must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LKoN2mb2sQwY6eLyEu1_spelltarget
attribs.current: A 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LKoN2mb2sQwY6eLyEu1_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Holy water or powdered silver and iron worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LKoN2mb2sQwY6eLyEu1_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the Duration increases by 1 hour for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LKoN2mb2sQwY6eLyEu1_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range. Glowing runes appear wherever the cylinder intersects with the floor or other surface. Choose one or more of the following types of creatures: celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead. The circle affects a creature of the chosen type in the following ways: The creature cant willingly enter the cylinder by nonmagical means. If the creature tries to use teleportation or interplanar travel to do so, it must first succeed on a Charisma saving throw. The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets within the cylinder. Targets within the cylinder cant be charmed, frightened, or possessed by the creature. When you cast this spell, you can elect to cause its magic to operate in the reverse direction, preventing a creature of the specified type from leaving the cylinder and protecting targets outside it.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LarzhESj2Zgq3NmhwFw_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.

An affected target's speed is halved, it takes a 2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't use reactions. On its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both. Regardless of the creature's abilities or magic items, it can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn.

If the creature attempts to cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action, roll a d20. On an 11 or higher, the spell doesn't take effect until the creature's next turn, and the creature must use its action on that turn to complete the spell. If it can't, the spell is wasted.

A creature affected by this spell makes another Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LarzhESj2Zgq3NmhwFw_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to 6 creatures in a 40-foot-cube within range

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lb1SEdebeHrbJZl2sdl_description
attribs.current: At 15th level, you gain the ability to teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see when you use your Action Surge. You can teleport before or after the additional action.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LbBkA6INwBE3debSGyj_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Requires Attunement

	You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition, the weapon ignores resistance to slashing damage.

When you attack a creature that has at least one head with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, you cut off one of the creature's heads. The creature dies if it can't survive without the lost head. A creature is immune to this effect if it is immune to slashing damage, doesn't have or need a head, has legendary actions, or the DM decides that the creature is too big for its head to be cut off with this weapon. Such a creature instead takes an extra 6d8 slashing damage from the hit.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LbBkA6INwBE3debSGyj_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Slashing, Secondary Damage: 1d10, Melee Attacks +3, Melee Damage +3

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LbCZ76Mt2TZhLhjJUQL_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For each spell of 4th level or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a successful check, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LbCZ76Mt2TZhLhjJUQL_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you automatically end the effects of a spell on the target if the spell's level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you used.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LbCb0grKDaHhaHTC7y5_spelldescription
attribs.current: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LbChqpQurxLabUZ2oHy_description
attribs.current:
You have practiced techniques useful in melee combat against spellcasters, gaining the following benefits:

When a creature within 5 feet of you casts a spell, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature.

When you damage a creature that is concentrating on a spell, that creature has disadvantage on the saving throw it makes to maintain its concentration.

You have advantage on saving throws against spells cast by creatures within 5 feet of you.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LbZm3hQmB8VBa6AW4nU_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Requires Attunement

These furred boots are snug and feel quite warm. While you wear them, you gain the following benefits:

 You have resistance to cold damage.

 You ignore difficult terrain created by ice or snow.

 You can tolerate temperatures as low as -50 degrees Fahrenheit without any additional protection. If you wear heavy clothes, you can tolerate temperatures as low as -100 degrees Fahrenheit.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LblHZ2dTztUZ2jH3dvA_itemcontent
attribs.current: While wearing this cloak with its hood up, you can breathe underwater, and you have a swimming speed of 60 feet. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcKHbdtaoTJz5bI5KWt_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Wondrous item, rare 



 This delicate silver chain has a brilliant-cut black  gem pendant. While you wear it, poisons have no effect on you. You are immune to the poisoned  condition and have immunity to poison damage.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcL-TyDfN5K5KP2jnhJ_description
attribs.current: Starting at 18th level, when you use your action to cast a spell, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Ld7iVZ35MxUmcu5pGHi_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Heavy Armor, AC: 18, Ac +3

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Ld7kAtOJAvogS-3mes5_itemcontent
attribs.current: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while you wear this cloak.
